talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Warrior Magenta${action:Talk}
{user_nick}!! I've been waiting!!

${user_nick}$
Magenta? What brings you here?

$Warrior Magenta$
What do you think?! I heard a rumor that Rambert showed up!
Well, did you meet your father??
<html>$Strength Elixir$</html>

${user_nick}$
You heard that too? Unfortunately…
The mysterious knight turned out to be Barnac, not my father

$Warrior Magenta${action:Talk}
Barnac? Not Rambert?
Damn… I thought my chance for revenge had finally come.

$Warrior Magenta$
Anyway… You do seem a lot stronger than when we last met.
You must be training quite hard.
But if you still haven't surpassed Barnac…
Just how strong do you have to be?

$Warrior Magenta$
This won't do! It seems I'll have to teach you my secret method after all!
With that, you can grow stronger in an instant!

${user_nick}$
You know… a secret to growing stronger? What is it, some kind of new training method?

$Warrior Magenta$
Training method? What kind of training would do that? The secret I speak of…
Is a strength elixir!

$Warrior Magenta$
In the Valley of Blindness there is a
really Special Book possessed by Jamilla Chieftain Tandan
that is said to contain information about an elixir that can give you great power!

$Warrior Magenta$
With that, you will be able to grow strong and meet Rambert in no time!

${user_nick}$
An elixir?! What's the good of that…?
I want to earn my strength through honest training!

$Warrior Magenta$
Who cares? Isn't the whole point just to grow stronger?
So you can meet Rambert? Don't you want to see your father?

${user_nick}$
Of course I do.
But to cut corners like that seems…

$Warrior Magenta$
Ugh, who cares?! There are lots of ways to grow stronger.
I'm just telling you a way to do it a little more easily.
If you're going to be so picky… maybe you don't really want to be strong all that much after all.

$Warrior Magenta$
Ugh, whatever! Just go get the book!
The one who knows how to make the strength elixir
must be a strong monster, so it will be good training for you!

${user_nick}$
Why are you so pushy…?

$Warrior Magenta$
Quiet!!! I said I'd make you strong, so do as I say!

$Warrior Magenta$
Now that you've finally got it drilled through your head, go to the Valley of Blindness,
meet Jamilla Chieftain Tandan, and get the Special Book!

$Warrior Magenta${action:Talk}
Did you get the book?

${user_nick}$
Yes, here it is. (Hands over the book.)
But do you know how to read this? It doesn't look like any script I've ever seen…

$Warrior Magenta$
Hehehe, of course! I spent 3 days studying to read this book!
That's why they call me Great Warrior Magenta! Some simple writing could never hold me-…
Huh?! What kind of writing is this?!

${user_nick}$
Does this mean… you can't read it?

$Warrior Magenta$
N-, no way! I know I studied this... Yes, this one! I know what this says!
This says "jute," and this says "dried raspberry"!!!
What, you didn't think I could read simple ingredients? (Clears throat and puts hand on waist.)

${user_nick}$
But if you can't read the cooking instructions underneath, we can't make it, right?

$Warrior Magenta$
Tsk, well… in that case… we should find someone who can read it!
Maybe a Heraldry Scholar? That's it! We'll ask Stas!

${user_nick}$
Stas?

$Warrior Magenta$
That's right! Stas should be able to read it, don't you think?
Just make sure to only ask him to read the recipe on this page.
In the meantime, I'll collect the ingredients.

${user_nick}$
But... Do I really need to make this potion?

$Warrior Magenta$
Don't start with that again. Just go!
I'll get everything ready in the meantime!

$Warrior Magenta$
Go ask Heraldry Scholar Stas in Saint Haven!
Good luck!!!

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Welcome. You've been quite busy lately. What brings you to see me?

${user_nick}$
Uh, yeah. It's just this recipe… Someone wants to make it
but they don't know how to read the ingredients list.
Do you think you can translate it for me?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Of course. One moment. What part do you need me to translate?

${user_nick}$
The recipe written down here. (Opens to the page showed by Magenta.)

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
This is… yes. It's a script from ancient times. Hmm... You say you want to make this?
Mind telling me where you got this book in the first place?

${user_nick}$
I got it from Jamilla Chieftain Tandan in the Valley of Blindness... Why, is there a problem?
I was told it was a recipe for a Strength Elixir…

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Ahem, well... That's true in a manner of speaking…
In fact, this is a recipe for a type of aphrodisiac.
Perhaps the Jamilla tribe refers to such vigor as "strength..." Ahem...

${user_nick}$
What?! Come again??? An aphrodisiac?!
It's not to make me physically stronger?!

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
This sort of mix is common between cultures.
Anyone could've made the same mistake…
Anyway, if you are planning on making it, could you do me a favor?

${user_nick}$
Uh, actually I'm pretty sure the plan is off...

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Well, you could always make some in the name of science and magic. Ahem...
Anyway, if you happen to make the elixir or have any ingredients left over... would you mind giving me some?
Uh, for research purposes only, of course!

${user_nick}$
Uh... Sure...

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
I'm serious!! Why would I need such a thing if not for research?
Anyway, this is my translation of the recipe, so take it with you.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Who knew there was a book with such information… What were the ingredients again?
Oh! I should write them down before I forget.

$Warrior Magenta${action:Talk}
There you are, {user_nick}! Well, did you get the cooking instructions?
I brought the ingredients! It wasn't easy to get a couple of them, but…
the rest were easy enough!

${user_nick}$
Hey, Magenta? About the elixir... Were you aware just what kind of a "strength potion" it is?

$Warrior Magenta$
Of course! An elixir granting great strength!
Why, are you finally into it?
Let's turn you into a powerful warrior so you can reunite with Rambert!

${user_nick}$
Uh, about that… (Magenta had no idea!)
I don't want to shock you, but... This elixir is actually…

${user_nick}$
It's an aphrodisiac, not a strength potion!!!

$Warrior Magenta$
Whaaat?

${user_nick}$
That's what Stas said...
It's not for enhancing strength per se…
He said there must have been something lost in translation due to cultural differences…
(Flustered.)

$Warrior Magenta$
Wh-what if he's lying?!!?
This is the information I paid all that money to the Prad brothers for?
I sold off all my equipment to pay for it because they said it was now or never.
They completely shook me down!

${user_nick}$
Isn't that the typical thing con artists say?

$Warrior Magenta$
Con artists?!
Are you saying I was conned?!

$Warrior Magenta$
No way!!! My 3000 gold!!! Argh!!! Those brothers are dead!!!
Sorry, {user_nick}!!! I have to go find those two,
so we'll discuss grower stronger later!!!

${user_nick}$
Wait, Magenta?!?!

$Warrior Magenta$
Those scamming brothers!!! I won't let them get away with this!!!
(Throws away the ingredients and runs off toward Saint Haven.)

${user_nick}$
Wait... What am I supposed to do with all these ingredients…?
Oh, right. Stas said he wanted these. I might as well bring them to him.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
So, the ingredients were… Jupe, red omija juice and… What was it again?!
(Seems to be racking his brains.)

${user_nick}$
Uh... Stas?

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Ack!!! Oh, i-is that you, {user_nick}?! (Hurriedly conceals the paper.)
That's just... Ahem. It's just some research I'm preparing for!

${user_nick}$
(Red omija juice and raspberry wine...?)

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Ahem! Anyway, what brings you here?
Could it be... Did you finish making that potion from earlier?

${user_nick}$
Uh, well… It turns out we were conned, so we don't plan on making the potion.
But we already got some of the ingredients…
And you seemed to be interested in the potion, so…

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Interested! Whatever do you mean?! I wouldn't give a Goblin's toenail for that elixir.

${user_nick}$
Oh, was I mistaken? I brought them because I thought you wanted them for your research.
(Scratches head awkwardly.)
Well, I suppose I should at least dispose of them for you... Maybe they can be food for the hound or something.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Uh, but… You went to all that effort to collect them...
I suppose I could use them for some kind of research effort. Strictly as a scholarly pursuit, I mean.

${user_nick}$
Research? So, you need the materials, then? Well, this is the lot of it.

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
That's it! That's the one! Blue wing mushroom! I can't believe you managed to get even that...
Uh, ahem!

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Thank you for the ingredients. This might not be much, but consider it a token of my appreciation.
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

$Heraldry Scholar Stas$
Oh, and please don't tell anyone that you gave me these...
Ahem... Thanks again.

journal.title: Reunion
journal.contents:
Shortly after confirming that the unidentified knight was Barnac, Warrior Magenta arrived. What brought her here this time? Go speak with her.

Riverwort Wharf - Warrior Magenta
journal.destination: Talk to Warrior Magenta at Riverwort Wharf

journal.title: Special Book
journal.contents:
Warrior Magenta is pressuring you to get the recipe for a strength elixir. Get the Special Book from Jamilla Chieftain Tandan in the Valley of Blindness.

Riverwort Wharf (Riverwort Ruins) - Valley of Blindness
journal.destination: Get Special Book in Valley of Blindness
journal.todo_msg: Get the Special Book in the Valley of Blindness.

journal.title: Strengthening Elixir
journal.contents:
You got the Special Book from Jamilla Chieftain Tandan, so go speak with Warrior Magenta in Riverwort Wharf.

Riverwort Wharf - Warrior Magenta
journal.destination: Talk to Warrior Magenta at Riverwort Wharf
journal.todo_msg: Take the Special Book to Magenta.

journal.title: Truth of the Recipe Ⅰ
journal.contents:
You were able to get the Special Book, but unfortunately, Warrior Magenta could not understand everything written within. Go speak with Heraldry Scholar Stas in Saint Haven and ask him to translate the recipe.

Saint Haven - Heraldry Scholar Stas
journal.destination: Speak with Heraldry Scholar Stas in Saint Haven
journal.todo_msg: Get Heraldry Scholar Stas to translate the recipe.

journal.title: Truth of the Recipe Ⅱ
journal.contents:
You learned that the elixir is not actually for increasing strength, but something a bit different. Did Warrior Magenta already knows this? Go to Riverwort Wharf and tell Warrior Magenta the truth of the recipe.

Riverwort Wharf - Warrior Magenta
journal.destination: Talk to Warrior Magenta at Riverwort Wharf
journal.todo_msg: Bring the translated recipe to Magenta.

journal.title: The Last Laugh
journal.contents:
Warrior Magenta was furious upon learning that she was conned. She simply tossed aside the gathered ingredients and left to catch the brothers who tricked her... Now you have to do something about the ingredients. It seemed like Heraldry Scholar Stas was interested in the elixir. You should go meet Heraldry Scholar Stas in Saint Haven.

Saint Haven - Heraldry Scholar Stas
journal.destination: Speak with Heraldry Scholar Stas in Saint Haven
